metadata.name: Omni Penguin #1
metadata.description: As a result of a very serious environmental crisis, which is called global warming, the population of penguins is threatened with the disappearance of their usual habitat. The Layer Zero scientists have put all their effort to rescue our poor penguins. They managed to resettle 1,111 penguins into 7 new continents: Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, Polygon, Avalanche, Fantom, Optimism, and Arbitrum. Be the part of the penguin's supportive team, and discover some additional continents (e.g. Solana, Cosmos) further with us!
